name: America SCORES Bay Area
description: Founded in 2001, America SCORES Bay Area empowers students in urban communities using soccer, poetry, creative expression, and service-learning. With teamwork as the unifying value, the goal of SCORES is that youth are inspired to lead healthy lifestyles, be engaged students, and have the character and confidence to make a difference in the world. SCORES unique combination of soccer, poetry, and service-learning programs engages youth and creates a positive team environment where students have t
